<Row className="resource-card-group">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="IBM Logo Request Tool in Brand Center"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://github.com/IBM/carbon-elements/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md"
      >

</ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="The IBM Business Partner marks"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://github.com/IBM/carbon-elements/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md"
      >
This is tile logotype for IBM Services. It is the primary identifier of our brand, and should be treated with respectappear in black or reversed to white on dark backgrounds.
When using the logotype, it must appear in tile context of the IBM master brand. Specifically, the IBM 8-bar logo should be featured with the IBM Services logotype in all communications.
The IBM Services logotype should be prominently placed when appearing with the IBM 8-bar logo. It should be flush left and appear before the IBM logo.
Shown here are schematic examples of the IBM Services logotype placement in relat ion to the IBM 8-Bar logo.

There are specific offerings and practices that are approved as lockups with IBM Services, and there are type treatment specifications for doing so consis ten tly Every name that includes "Services" offers the oppor tunity to portray the
dist inct value of our offerings and practices, while also helping others navigate the Service s portfolio. For additional guidance on naming, please contact IBM Services Brand Forum
